personal.fullBio:
Chicago Coding Systems has specialized in the research, development, and manufacturing of marking, coding, and labeling technologies for over 60 years. Our knowledge and experience allows us to meet our customer's needs by providing them with quality service and products. We diligently research the market for new technologies that allow us to create the best solutions available for our customers. We strive to bring people, ideas and technology together.

Our goal is to provide consultations, technical support, and innovative, custom solutions that exceed client expectations. Our solution-oriented approach drives us to surpass client expectations, and helps to build long-lasting partnerships.

With over half a century of industry experience, countless custom solutions across the nation, and a shared passion for excellence and automation, the Chicago Coding team will accelerate your production and be there to provide lasting support.

solutions.title: Marking & Coding
solutions.description: Whether you need batch coding, barcoding, or high-speed product marking, we deliver precision, reliability, and customization to meet your industry's unique requirements. Custom built solutions are engineered to increase productivity and save you money.

solutions.title: Labeling
solutions.description: From automated label application and print-and-apply systems to fully integrated labeling solutions, we deliver precision, reliability, and customization tailored to your production needs. Our solutions ensure accurate label application and reliable adhesion.

solutions.title: Scanning
solutions.description: Our scanning solutions provide accurate data capture, improve efficiency, minimize errors, and ensure dependable results for every production run using advanced industrial scanners and machine vision technology.

solutions.title: Software Development & Integration
solutions.description: Custom software solutions that connect your labeling, coding, and scanning systems with your existing ERP, WMS, and MES platforms. Middleware integration without the need for major IT projects.

solutions.title: Material Handling
solutions.description: Material handling solutions designed to efficiently move, protect, and control materials throughout manufacturing and warehousing operations. Conveyors, reject stations, and packaging line components.

solutions.title: Products
solutions.description: Versatile products designed to support your workflow and streamline operations. From label printers and applicators to scanners and vision systems from industry-leading brands.

footer.tagline: Chicago Coding Systems can maximize your production efficiency.

process.title: Assessment
process.fullDesc: We begin by thoroughly understanding your current production operations, challenges, and goals. This includes site visits, line walkthroughs, and assessment of existing systems to identify the right approach for your specific environment.

process.title: Design
process.fullDesc: Based on assessment findings, we design a tailored automation solution that integrates with your existing systems. We select the right equipment from industry-leading brands and create a detailed integration plan for your production line.

process.title: Implementation
process.fullDesc: Our team builds and integrates your custom solution, handling everything from equipment installation to software configuration and network integration. We ensure seamless connection with your existing ERP, WMS, and production systems.

process.title: Support
process.fullDesc: We provide 24/7 technical support with a 4-hour response guarantee, inventory management for consumables, and ongoing optimization to keep your production running at peak efficiency. Our partnership doesn't end at installation.

problems.solution: Manually labeling thousands of items isn't sustainable. We design automated solutions that streamline labeling and reduce errors across your production line.
Connecting labeling systems with WMS and ERP platforms can be costly and IT-heavy. Our discovery process identifies the right approach, often using middleware to integrate without major IT projects.
Cold storage, freezers, and high-moisture conditions test the limits of standard labels. We test and design labels, adhesives, and inks proven to withstand challenging environments.
From hazmat labeling to regulatory requirements, we guide you through necessary standards to ensure shipments are compliant and traceable across all industries.
Every production line is different. We go beyond one-size-fits-all offerings to deliver the right fit, and if the best solution isn't ours, we'll connect you with a partner.
Production never stops, and neither do we. Our 24/7 support team with a 4-hour response guarantee keeps your operation running smoothly.
We're industrial print integrators, not distributors. We recommend what's best specifically for you, not what generates the highest commission.
Whether it's pharmaceuticals, food, automotive, or cannabis, our flexible systems handle individual components as well as full production and logistics workflows.
Our inventory management service ensures your coding and labeling supplies are always on hand, giving you consistent, hassle-free stock management.
New systems fail without proper training. We provide hands-on training and documentation so your team can operate, troubleshoot, and maintain systems confidently.
